name: Who Wants to be a Millionaire: 2nd Edition
overview: THE CHANCE TO WIN A VIRTUAL MILLION IS IN YOUR HANDS Grab your Nintendo DS to take on the world's most popular game show. Get into training, choose your favourite category and answer personalised questions to make a million. Create your profile and answer questions tailored exclusivity to you in this all new version. Choose your question preference to make your fortune - entertainment, sport or general knowledge. Train yourself to become a virtual millionaire in the no pressure practice mode Faster Finger First now on the DS!
